page.title: 06Farm Machinery
page.content: Today a lot of machinery is used to help "speed up"the planting and harvesting. The basic design of the{1936 Massey {Ferguson}tractor is the same but in the last few years all the tractors have a{safety cab}to reduce the{noise} level for the farmer and to prevent { {accidents.}For example, in the last five years the Round Bailer introduced is faster and more economical.The Mower used to cut grass for silage has been designed to{bruise}the grass as it is cut so that it{dries}out quickly and the Corn Mower can move up to 30 tonnes in an hour.
